text: Santita Jackson (born July 17, 1963) is an American singer and political commentator. Jackson toured with Roberta Flack and performed the National Anthem at President Bill Clinton's second inauguration. She has appeared on the Fox News Channel and is the host of a television show on The Word Network. ==References== ==Other websites== * Personal Website * Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:American political commentators Category:Singers from North Carolina Category:Singers from Chicago Category:Radio personalities from Chicago
title: Santita Jackson
